U

update(Station) - 类 中的方法ride.User
observer pattern, user is an observer to be notified with returnability of told end station
update(Station) - 接口 中的方法station.Observer
 
updateStatistic(Record) - 类 中的方法ride.User
to record ride times and duration of the user after a riding, and give 5 minutes time credit to him if bike is returned to a plus station
UseCase - testSenario中的类
Rental of a bike 1. a user (card holder or not) rent a bike of a given type from a given station at a given moment in time 2. the user returns the bike to another station after a given duration (expressed in minutes). 3. the user get charged for the corresponding amount (possibly 0) and possibly receive a time-credit (possibly 0)
UseCase() - 类 的构造器testSenario.UseCase
 
UseCase1 - testSenario中的类
simulate that a user apply for solutions with different policies, then accept this solution, and shut down the end station finally try to return back bike to this station.
UseCase1() - 类 的构造器testSenario.UseCase1
 
User - ride中的类
a user can hold a card and rent bike.
User() - 类 的构造器ride.User
a default constructor
User(String) - 类 的构造器ride.User
a user with given name
